page.title: 10TURKEY FARM
page.content: The Turkey farm is called 'Chisbon Turkey Farm nad is owned by Mr.Snell. The size of the farm is very big with lots of buildings and big sheds. Mr.Snellhas been working at the farm since 1963. Heusually gets up in th morning at 7.00am. and goes to bed at midnight. Mr. Snell breeds his own turkeys from his breeding stock and has about 1500 turkeys at present. He tries to get as much money as possible for each one but the cost varies from time to time. The turkeys are electricuted and then their necks are broken by twisting their heads.After,they hang them up and then pluck the feathers off and put the feathers in the middle of the room.Then they cut off their heads and feet and gut them. They are then ready to be sold whole or cut up into joints for sale.
